articles.description: Willenhall Social Club is the biggest social club in the Midlands, but also sits in the neighbourhood with highest infection rates
articles.content:
Members of a popular social club in Coventry have spoken of their heartbreak at yesterday's announcement Coventry will be in Tier 3 Covid-19 restrictions.
